text: Tumi ki musara parabartikale isara'ilera bansadharadera pradhanadera bisaye bhebe dekha ni, yakhana tara tadera nabike balechila -- ''amadera jan'ya ekajana raja ut'thapana karo yena amara allah‌ra pathe larate pari’’? Tini balechilena -- ''emanata ki tomadera habe ye tomadera jan'ya yud'dha bidhibad'dha kara hale tomara yud'dha karabe na?’’ Tara balechila -- ''amadera ki hayeche ye amara allah‌ra pathe yud'dha karabo na yakhana amara amadera barighara o santana-santati theke bitarita hayechi?’’ Kintu yakhana tadera jan'ya yud'dha bidhibad'dha kara halo, tara phire damrala tadera madhyera alpa kayekajana chara. Ara allah an'yayakaridera sanbandhe sarbajnata.
